title: Will i ever get a consistent FPS?
body:
hi guys, i need help with league.
i've been playing league for a few years, and recently build a cheap pc to hopefully get decent fps. but its always sitting just below 60fps.
my specs are:
cpu: AMD athlon 5350
Ram: 16gb
gpu: Gtx 750ti

my settings are already low, and i set league to high priority, but even so, late game i get 20fps, and thats when being able to play properly is most important.
anyone got any tips?

replies.body:
Hey there,

It seems you meet most of the recommended specs to run the game smoothly, however your CPU is rather underpowered (2.1ghz base clock).

Have you looked into upgrading your CPU?

I would also recommend reinstalling your GPU drivers, just to ensure that isnt causing you problems.
